channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Water leaking from manhole centre of main tewkesbury road, 26th January
item.description:
Manhole middle of road outside st peters church tewkesbury road cheltenham water has been running out for about two weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93, Tewkesbury Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole Churchdown lane, 25th January
item.description:
Its near number 25 I believe. By road name post before the next left. Don't normally drive this way but did due to traffic. Having to report again due to doing it on phone and it hit report anonymously which I do not want to do as want to claim

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown Lane, Gloucester

item.title: Following the water leak the road is like a farm track. You have to pick which pothole you think will cause the least damsge fir about 100 yards. There is a trench in the midfle. Needs temporary lighrs back until its fixed, 25th January

Before turning to Pilgrave way about 200 yds to 100 yds headin
